thread.title: Ground News - High levels of carbon monoxide, mould found in homes on Ontario reserves: study
thread.title_full: Ground News - High levels of carbon monoxide, mould found in homes on Ontario reserves: study

author: Ground AI
title: Ground News - High levels of carbon monoxide, mould found in homes on Ontario reserves: study
text:
Left Center Right
Bias Insights
Bias Insights Air inside homes on remote First Nations in northwestern Ontario contains carbon monoxide, fine particles, mould, and other substances that increase respiratory infections. About 27% of the homes had elevated levels of carbon monoxide. Researchers found endotoxin levels higher than in any previous study in Canada.
Insights by Ground AI
Does this summary seem wrong? Share menu More
